tool_description: Reach gasoline and diesel prices in different fuel stations in different cities.
name: Gas Price
title: Gas Price

api_list.name: europeanCountries
api_list.description: Service that brings up the current gasoline prices at european countries.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gas-price.p.rapidapi.com/europeanCountries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gas-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: usaCitiesList
